entry.title: Instructions for Surviving a Gotham Heatwave
entry.summary:
Author: ziptiesand

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,650Chapters: 4/22Kudos: 6

Summary: Clark is not getting the romantic summer vacation Bruce promised, and instead, has been assigned the company of one Zatanna Zatara while Bruce continues to work on another ever-important, ever-urgent case in Gotham. The thing is, this would all be fine and normal, if Zatanna's heart wasn't constantly skipping a beat whenever Clark was around, or if she and Bruce weren't teetering on the edge of spilling their guts out to each other at any given moment.Meanwhile, Red Hood is on the verge of another Lazarus Pit-induced mental breakdown, Nightwing is only just starting to remember that his name is not, in fact, Ric Grayson, and they keep crossing paths while on a case. Cue cat-and-mouse chases across rooftops, trips to Zatanna's parlour of magical cognitive therapy, and an undercover drugs bust at The Iceberg Lounge, where ex crime-lord Red Hood might get more than he bargained for with his interim partner in crime.It's going to be an interesting summer.
